titles.title: Take Thine Own Way With Me (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take Thine own way with me dear Lord Thou canst not otherwise than bless I launch me forth upon a sea Of boundless love and tenderness{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I could not choose a larger bliss Than to be wholly Thine and mine A will whose highest joy is this To caselessly unclasp in Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will not fear Thee O my God The days to come can only bring Their perfect sequences of love Thy larger deeper comforting{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Within the shadow of this love Loss doth transmute itself to gain Faith veils earth's sorrow in its light And straightway lives above her pain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are not losers thus we share the prefect gladness of the Son Not conquered for behold we reign Conquered and Conqueror are one{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy wonderful grand will my God Triumphantly I make it mine And faith shall breathe her glad Amen To every dear command of Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Beneath the splendor of Thy choice Thy perfect choice for me I rest Outside it now I dare not live Within it I must needs be blest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Meanwhile my spirit anchors calm In grander regions still than this The fair far-shining latitudes Of that yet unexplored bliss{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then may Thy perfect glorious will Be evermore fulfilled in me And make my life an answering chord Of glad responsive harmony{/lang-eng}
